task_prefix: Remote sensing dataset for detecting diseased trees (Japanese oak wilt and Japanese pine wilt) in Quickbird satellite imagery. Contains spectral and texture features from image segments with highly imbalanced classes. Each example contains 5 features. Forest health monitoring.

column_descriptions.GLCM_pan: Gray Level Co-occurrence Matrix texture feature from panchromatic band
column_descriptions.Mean_Green: Mean value of green band pixels within segment
column_descriptions.Mean_Red: Mean value of red band pixels within segment
column_descriptions.Mean_NIR: Mean value of near-infrared band pixels within segment
column_descriptions.SD_pan: Standard deviation of panchromatic band within segment
